WHY Costa Rica?

Get to know what pura vida means.

Visit the most incredible National Parks.

Experience six active volcanoes, and all their glory!

There are over 500.000 species of animals.

Enjoy the incredible culinary experience.

Stay at world class resorts, all over the country.

WHAT are some of the activities?

Scuba Diving

Discover the beautiful waters in Costa Rica.

Culture

Get to know Costa Rica and its people.

Ziplining

Enjoy the forests from uptop.

History

Learn about Costa Rica's history.

WHO visits Costa Rica?

Literally anyone can visit Costa Rica. Any person with desires of adventure and to create an experience can come.

WHERE to go inside Costa Rica?

Capital of Costa Rica

Alajuela

Visit a very famous volcanoe

Original capital of Costa Rica

Known as "Ciudad de las flores"

Puntarenas

Limón

WHEN to visit Costa Rica?

Immersive Program - First Project

Felipe Hidalgo Arguedas
